channel.title: Cache Editor
channel.description: Dear Moparscapians! I want to rename some objects (not the java objects, but the in-game objects) and NPCs and I used a Cache Editor(from Medorphins tool kit), but it can only rename items. Does anybody know another Cache Editor what can rename objects??

item.title: Cache Editor
item.dc:creator: @MrMud MrMud
item.description:
@MrMud wrote:

mm, okay thanks, im not a hardcore java coder but ill give it a try

Read full topic

item.title: Cache Editor
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

MrMud:

Dear Moparscapians! I want to rename some objects (not the java objects, but the in-game objects) and NPCs and I used a Cache Editor(from Medorphins tool kit), but it can only rename items. Does anybody know another Cache Editor what can rename objects??

Well technically, you could create a command client-side that changed the name. Or you could unpack the cache, find loc.dat, find the object id, replace the existing name with the new one, if the new name length is less than the old, remove all bytes up to 0x0A, and if the new name length exceeds the old length, after you overwrite the existing bytes, insert the rest of the letters.

Or I suppose you could hard-code it.

Read full topic
